title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 447 - Agency Boarding Homes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 447 - Agency Boarding Homes

State Regulations
§ 447.1 - Conditions of operations of an agency boarding home program
§ 447.2 - Requirements for each agency boarding home
§ 447.3 - Exceptions
§ 447.4 - Procedure for initiation of agency boarding home program
§ 447.5 - Notice to the department of the opening of an agency boarding home; periodic reports
§ 447.6 - Discontinuance
§ 447.7 to 447.8 - [Repealed]
§ 447.9 - Approved respite care and services provider
§ 447.10 - Certification for Specialized Programs to Serve Prenatal, Postpartum or Parenting Youth
§ 447.11 - Waivers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 447

Statutory authority: N.Y. Const., art. XVII, § 2; Social

Services Law, §§20, 34, 374-b, 398-a, 424-a, 427, 462; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
